overview: The fine sex-trash movie.  Turmoil in Special Department 6: A cock-amputated madman emerges and has involved Inspector Horst D. and his colleague "Balla-Kalle" into a bloody event. The intrepid officers uncover the terrible secret of Doctor Meier and her henchmen in the "Hospital of Horror"....
tagline: Poor girls in chains, in the hands of power crazed types with evil cocks!
title: Hospital des Grauens
